Its headquarters are in [[Bern]], [[Switzerland]]. It covers the area of the nations of [[Afghanistan]], [[Algeria]], [[Andorra]], [[Austria]], [[Belgium]], the [[Czech Republic]], [[France]], [[Germany]], [[Gibraltar]], [[Iran]], [[Italy]], [[Libya]], [[Liechtenstein]], [[Luxembourg]], [[Malta]], [[Monaco]], [[Morocco]], [[Portugal]], [[Romania]], [[San Marino]], [[Slovakia]], [[Spain]], [[Switzerland]], [[Tunisia]], [[Turkey]], [[Vatican City]], and [[Western Sahara]].
It is subdivided into eleven unions, three mission fields, and one territory.
